title: 57 ways to capture a dying star: Astronomers get a glimpse of what will happen when our sun dies
description: "With ALMA, we can now see the atmosphere of a dying star with a level of clarity in a similar way to what we do for the sun."
content: "With ALMA, we can now see the atmosphere of a dying star with a level of clarity in a similar way to what we do for the sun."
